root.name: Hayate no Gotoku! Ojousama Produce Daisakusen Boku Iro ni Somare!
root.description: OverviewHayate no Gotoku! Ojousama Produce Daisakusen Boku Iro ni Somare! is the second game based on the Hayate no Gotoku! anime series. It was developed by Konami and released on March 14, 2008 for Nintendo DS. The game comes in two versions; Gakkou-hen (School Chapter) and Oyashiki-hen (Mansion Chapter). The main difference is the setting. The player controls Hayate, and it is their objective to turn Nagi into a lady so that she can win a contest. The player can do so by picking out her clothes and taking her on dates.
